CONVERSATION GROUP: Thank you! Please convince him not to kill her. I'd be lost without Guen.

Dan/WOTC trim to downplay this a bit: Her full name is Guenhwyvar.  I named her after something I heard in a story a long time ago.  I don't remember all the details but the fight scenes were incredible.
Thank you so much. Please take this, I know it isn't much but it's all I can afford right now.

I thought that might happen. I couldn't bare to do it myself.
I understand. I couldn't do it either.
Well hurry up and tell him. Then get back here for your reward!
